name: Spending Time
description:
Spending time is a 2D shooter where in order to get better upgrades for your character, you have to speed up time, making enemies a more challenging threat.

There are many modes in the game, such as:

  • Classic, the basic game.
  • Bouncy, where only bouncy enemies spawn and you bounce around the arena.
  • Insane, where there are no limits on stats or speed.
  • Boss Rush, where every round is a boss.

This is part of the GameDevTV Game Jam 2020 with the theme of Time. It's also my first proper finished game!

Controls

WASD to move
Aim with your mouse and click to shoot
W or Space to jump

Source

https://www.mediafire.com/file/p4zag3sejp2qq2p/start_-_SOURCE.zip/file

Thanks to ChromaYote for help playtesting!
